page.title: 17HOSPITALS IN KNUTSFORD
page.content: In Knutsford there were two hospitals and quite alot of old peoples homes. The cottage hospital has recently closed down but Cranford Lodge hospital still remains. There was a workhouse on the site before Cranford. One lady has been in the hospital since the age of four and she is now seventy eight.There are four wards in Cranford. Cranford looks after old people, mainly women. The hospital has fifty four beds,ten for the G.P.. Shifts are eight hours and twelve hours at night.One of the nurses said "You have to enjoy the job to be good at it". There is a section in the hospital where old people can come in and do things like make wicker baskets (occupational therapy). People come in to exercise and enjoy themselves. .
